title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 123.2 - Time for pleas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 123.2 - Time for pleas

State Regulations
A plea shall be entered within 15 days after the date of
receipt of the summons by the motorist. Any mail transaction will be considered
timely if post-marked on or before the last day authorized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
123.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
